title: LoL corrupts every 3 or so games
body:
When I used to play LoL, everything was fine and i had a great time carrying my trash friends.
But recently, on the loading screen my game would crash and would tell me I had disconnected. I would then close the client, and open up the launcher again, which would tell me my game had been corrupted, and I had to reinstall LoL. I've gotten so many 20 minute low priority queues from this, and it's really frustrating now playing and hoping your game doesn't crash and corrupt itself.

If anyone can provide help, i'll be really grateful ;)

replies.body:
It's hard to tell what might be causing your issue as it could to be a combination of connection and computer problems crashing your game.  If the game crash guide Rineyy posted didn't resolve this, we should look a bit deeper by submitting a ticket.  Our tech team can review this a bit further through your ticket, and attaching the following logs can help provide more context for them:

[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
[Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.

If you continue to experience error messages or crashes after this, do not hesitate to let us know. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg

I'm no expert on this type of stuff, and there aren't enough details for me to give you a specific diagnosis or whatever, but I had a lot of trouble opening the software, "Unreal Engine" in the past because I didn't have enough RAM. I got some more, and now it runs fine. although it's unlikely that we have the same problem, it  might be related to the specs on your computer. Check your specs, and then check the recommended ones for league. This is probably not it, but it's good to be sure first.
